locale.message: Export or register issue or article metadata in CrossRef's deposit XML format.

To register DOIs with CrossRef you must be a CrossRef member. You can visit CrossRef, for more details. If you do not have your own username and password you'll still be able to export into the CrossRef deposit XML format but you cannot register your DOIs through OJS. Please note that the password will be saved as plain text, i.e. not encrypted, due to the CrossRef registration service requirements.
Please configure the CrossRef export plug-in before using it for the first time.
Please configure the CrossRef export plug-in:
Please enter the username you got from CrossRef. The username may not contain colons.

Usage: {$scriptName} {$pluginName} export xmlFileName journal_path {issues|articles} objectId1 [objectId2] ... {$scriptName} {$pluginName} register journal_path {issues|articles} objectId1 [objectId2] ...
